${ModID}:DiscardNextTurn.NAME: Discard Next Turn
DESCRIPTIONS: Discard !A! card next turn.

${ModID}:DrawNextTurn.NAME: Draw Next Turn
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw !A! card next turn.

${ModID}:Resonating.NAME: Resonating
DESCRIPTIONS: Adds a #yResonant card to your hand next turn.

${ModID}:Frostbite.NAME: Frostbite
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever this enemy attacks, it suffers !A! damage then reduces Frostbite by 1.

${ModID}:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
DESCRIPTIONS: The first !A! time you attack each turn, draw a card.

${ModID}:EnergizedTurquoise.NAME: Energized
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b !A! additional [E] next turn.

${ModID}:BrrZerk.NAME: Brr Zerk
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you attack, apply !A! #yFrostbite.

${ModID}:TempNegStrength.NAME: Damage Down
DESCRIPTIONS: Does !A! less damage with attacks this turn.

${ModID}:Crushed.NAME: Crushed
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes !A! more damage from attacks.

${ModID}:ChaoticMind.NAME: Chaotic Mind
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card this turn, discard !A! random card to draw !A! random card.

${ModID}:Corroded.NAME: Corroded
DESCRIPTIONS: Vulnerable increases damage by an additional 50% for !A! turns.

${ModID}:ExplosiveSigil.NAME: Explosive Sigils
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you discard a #ySigil, ALL enemies lose !A! HP.

${ModID}:Nauseous.NAME: Nauseous
DESCRIPTIONS: Weak reduces damage by an additional 25% for !A! turns.

${ModID}:InvisibleSpray.NAME: Not Here
DESCRIPTIONS: Bug with Spray card, I should not be seen.

${ModID}:Decaying.NAME: Decaying
DESCRIPTIONS: Loses !A! HP at the start of its turn.

${ModID}:Shadowcloak.NAME: Shadowcloak
DESCRIPTIONS: The first attack you play each turn does #b
% more damage.

${ModID}:TempHPOnHit.NAME: Life Leech
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain !A! #yTemporary #yHP whenever you strike a target.

${ModID}:Jinx.NAME: Jinx
DESCRIPTIONS: When debuffed, this creature will lose !A! HP.

${ModID}:Speed.NAME: Speed
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw !A! card and discard card.

${ModID}:SoulFeed.NAME: Soul Feed
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a non-minion enemy dies, gain 1 Max HP.

${ModID}:HundredCuts.NAME: Hundred Cuts
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, deal !A! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:StoneSkin.NAME: Stoneskin
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would take damage, take !A! less.
